settings.enable-blur-hint: ⚠️ Activating this setting may cause a drop in performance.
settings.chat-opacity-hint: If this setting is enabled, the chat cards will become transparent after a certain delay. Hover over a chat card will make it opaque again.
settings.chat-opacity-value-hint: If "Chat opacity" is enabled, this setting controls the opacity value of the chat cards.
settings.chat-opacity-timer-hint: If "Chat opacity" is enabled, this setting controls how long before a newly created chat card becomes transparent (in seconds).
settings.collapse-hotbar-hint: Collapses the hotbar on startup. You may find this setting usefull if your party do not use macros.
settings.no-pause-hint: Removes the pause on startup. Only if a GM logs in.
settings.reduce-scene-list-hint: Reduces the height of scenes in the sidebar.

theme-glass.blurWarningMessage: ⚠️ This module makes extensive use of blur effects. If you experience a drop in performance, you can click on the button below to disable the setting: "Blur effects".
